name: NOTUBOT UserBot
description: [notubot] Another UserBot written in Python 3.8 using Telethon for awesome Telegram user

ALIVE_LOGO.description: Show Image/Logo in .alive message. Fill value of image your link image, use telegra.ph or any direct link image

ALIVE_IG.description: Show your Instagram account in .alive message (put username without @)

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running [python3 session.py] in Termux or local system

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key, get it from 'dashboard.heroku.com/account'

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Add the this Heroku app name here

UPSTREAM_REPO_URL.description: In case you maintain a fork, add your repo URL here

BOTLOG.description: Incase you want to turn off logging ex (Error, GBAN, FBAN), put this to False

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: Chat ID of the logging group/channel, get it from '@MissRose_bot' add the bot to your group/channel and send /id

I_DEV.description: Enable a developer command by set it True

NOSPAM_GROUP.description: Blacklist your group from gcast feature, get your group ID from '@MissRose_bot' send /id then put the ID into here example: -1001596433756 -1001307868573 (multiple without commas)
